helpgrid.innerhtml: To show My Location on the map, you need to allow the browser to share your location with the server. After the permission is granted, you may need to click the refresh button. Only the records which have the service address defined will be shown on the map.
Set the Problem status to In Progress when work begins.
The following tickets are similar to the current ticket. Click Relate Records to relate the selected tickets to the current ticket. Click Cancel to return; your ticket will not be saved.
The following are suggested classifications for this ticket. Click Select Classification to choose a classification. Click Cancel to return.
These tables list the Follow Up Records generated from the current ticket.

The following tickets are similar to the current ticket. Click Relate Records to relate the selected tickets to the current ticket. Click Relate Records to Global Issue to relate the selected tickets to the global issue. Click Cancel to return; your ticket will not be saved.

pushbutton.clickmessage: Record(s) have been related to Global Issue.
pushbutton.label: Relate Records to Global Issue
